item1: ITEM 1 – BUSINESS NORTH AMERICA Sales North America segment accounted approximately 77 percent total sales 2024. segment serves residential commercial end markets broad range products including: . residential commercial water heaters primarily come sizes ranging 40 80 gallon models, however, also offer sizes low 2.5 gallon (point-of-use) high 2,500 gallon products varying efficiency ranges. offer electric, natural gas liquid propane tank-type models well tankless (gas electric), heat pump solar tank units.
